properties.areaDesc: Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY out 20 nm; Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm; Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 5 at 3:41PM EST until February 7 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...East to southeast winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25
kt, becoming south to southwest Thursday night into Friday.
Gusts up to 35 kt possible Friday afternoon. Seas 7 to 12 feet
expected.

* WHERE...The ocean waters south of Long Island out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 3 AM Thursday to 6 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM THURSDAY TO 6 PM EST FRIDAY
